item.title: Hello
item.description: After a while I have decided to create some simple website for myself. Easiest approach I found was to host it on github and build it with Hugo. I decided on Pickels theme as it’s the simplest one. Here you can find step by step guide on how to use Hugo and Github to your advantage. Besides coding I also enjoy being in nature and taking photos, some of which I upload to 500px.
